title.rendered: SCS INFO Recognized As Fastest Growing Company In Deloitte Technology Fast 50 India 2019

content.rendered:
To make an already awesome year even more awesome, SCS INFO grabbed a spot at the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 India, a ranking of the 50 fastest growing tech companies in India. 

“Attracting enough customers to attain such fast growth over three years makes a strong statement about the quality of a company’s product and its leadership,” Rajiv Sundar, Program Director – Technology Fast 50 India 2019 and Partner, Deloitte India “SCS INFO Private Limited has shown the right caliber for growth.”

Combining Technology And Imagination

At Unified Infotech, we are firm believers of the fact that the best innovations and solutions are only generated through the combination of cutting edge technology and imagination. And that’s why our aim is not only to stay updated with the latest technology in the market but also use an ample amount of imagination to create unique solutions that are not only functional but also never before seen in the market. 

Not just web design and development, our services also extend to Android and iOS app development, as well as customized CRM and e-commerce solutions as well. Since day one we have only aim, and that is to provide our clients with the best in class solutions. 

Not Just Innovation Friendly But Budget Friendly As Well

At Unified Infotech, we are not only thinking about innovation but affordability as well. In our 10 years of operation, and generating 1500+ solutions for clients all over the world, we have learned that sometimes, good innovation stays out of reach for those who need it the most, just because they can not afford it. 

And that’s why we strive to provide the best and innovative solutions to our clients at the most affordable prices possible. Our client base is made up of both large enterprises as well as small startups. We are well aware of the problems our clients might face, which hinders their chances of getting the access to best possible solutions, and we do everything to solve those problems, providing clients with solutions that help them to increase and expand their business and revenue amount. 

Let’s see what our own CEO has to say about this amazing achievement we just unlocked!!

Q: How was the path from the very beginning of SCS INFO here as one of the Fastest Growing Technology Company in Deloitte Technology Fast 50 India 2019?

A: Well, the path was definitely not easy. It was hard to get here, and in the past 10 years, we have seen our fair share of failures as well as successes. As beginners, we had to learn as we went and that means we fell multiple times. And it might seem cliche, but the only thing that helped us is the fact that we didn’t stop. We went on, crafting solutions for our clients and trying new things, learning what works and what does not work. And eventually, we are here.

Q: How important do you think the work culture of your organization is to achieve such an accomplishment?

A: Many don’t think that retaining a proper work culture is not that important, but I would strongly disagree. The work culture of any organization is the backbone of the infrastructure that keeps the workforce happy. And as for the importance of the work culture at SCS INFO for this achievement? Well, it has been very important. We aim to keep a balanced work culture at our offices so that our teams feel excited and happy to come to the office every day. We make sure to nurture their ideas and talents so that they can give the best eventually leading the company towards a better brighter future. 

Q: What is next for you and your company Unified Infotech?

A: getting better at what we are doing, that’s what’s next for both me and my organization. Our aim has always been to be the best and we are continuously working towards that and we will keep continuing with that.  Providing the best services to our clients using the most advanced technology in the market, mixed with the most unique thinking in the industry, we are currently aiming to set the benchmark in the industry with our performance. And of course, there is the matter of beating our personal best every day.

Some Last Words On The Achievement

Sure we are taking a little time to smell the roses, and maybe celebrate a little at this achievement, but we still have a long way to go, and many other achievements like this to accomplish. Arriving this milestone was not easy, and reaching the next one is going to be equally hard if not harder, but we are not going to stop. Our end goal is only one- to give our clients the best services for their businesses.
